text:
Hey  everyone,
I want to embed something at the top of the activity page of a company - google maps, a text, an image. it is possible to do something like that? anyone ever did something similar?

Thanks in advance!

This is possible if you create a custom card via UI Extensions (you can look at the sample projects online - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-ui-extensions>) and set the content to whatever you wish - then customize the layout for the middle column and add your custom card to the top of the activity tab!
what directory are you in? might need to run `npx hs upload dist My-Theme` if you’re already in `theme`
<@U05KNCMAE7N> another maps request for crm customizations :point_up_2::skin-tone-2:
In the root of my repository, `theme/dist` relative to root

Thank you for the tag <@U3T21PDBK> :ty:

<@U0316Q86C0Z> I would love to know more about your use case for google maps
The command worked recently, wondering it something changed in `5.2.0`
So this is embarrassing... Somehow the `dist` folder worked it's way into our `.hsignore` :grimacing:
Ha. Just supposed to be in gitignore, eslintignore and all the others :slightly_smiling_face:
